data.system_settings: windows 10 1709 x64, Acer aspire VX,  Discord canary - Build number: 11585
data.actual_result: the selector goes outside of the visible area, and it select a friend that is currently not visible for you
data.expected_result: The friendlist scrolls down when reaching the last visible person on your friends list
data.short_description: Using alt + arrow down key in DM list, the highlight goes out of visible part of screen
data.steps_to_repro: - go to your friends list, select any friend, does not matter what position- use alt + down arrow to scroll down in your friends list - keep alt button pressed and use the arrow key to scroll down, some users need to do it fast others slow- After 10 - 15 Friends this bug happens, the first friends all work fine.- watch as how the selector goes down and scroll past the boundaries of the visible part of the screen
